entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add diagnostic ID to obsolete in SecurityTokenValidators #49558
  • NavMenu toggler doesn't work in Blazor Web App #49556
  • Blazor server localization not working correctly when using alternate folder for storing resource files #49550
  • Consider adding PIN as an option in Identity infrastructure as it is required in most of the projects now #49549
  • Accessibility testing for the Blazor Web template #49548
    8.0-rc2
  • Add ambiguity breaker (hook) in DefaultEndpointSelector #49547
  • SupplyParameterFromForm should also support binding data from the query string #49546
  • [Blazor] Ignore read only properties in form mapping #49545
  • Revamping form-binding in minimal APIs and MVC #49543
    8.0-rc1
  • Blazor Server: Read image saved as blob as base 64 string #49552
  • When using the `WebApplicationFactory`'s `HttpClient` the resulting `RequestMessage`'s contents are empty #49537
  • How to get http request headers accept value? #49535
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #49534
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #49533
  • WebApiAot source name not updated #49529

Closed

  • Don't break interactive components when their parent static content is updated #48764
    8.0-preview7
  • Start interactive components that were added dynamically #48763
    8.0-preview7
  • Blazor template with 3 projects : Client , Server , Shared in .net 8 Preview 6 #49540
  • The Blazor Server application runs significantly slower when using the HttpSys server #48799
  • app.use(xxxx) will not make project return 405 error in Asp.Net Core Middle ware. #49536
  • .net 8 P4 Brotli compress task not functioning as in previous previews #48308
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, json, json #49496
  • Generic Host Building is the complete opposite of clean code #49366
  • Upload build artifact with build info in 2.1 #49347
    2.1.x
  • Add support for anti-forgery middleware #49237
    8.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-preview7] [Blazor] Improvements to the interaction between SSR and interactive rendering #49557
    area-blazor
  • Update _LoginPartial.Identity.cshtml with correct returnUrl #49553
    area-ui-rendering
  • Update JwtBearer, WsFed, and OIDC handlers to use identity model 7 #49542
    Servicing-approved, area-security, community-contribution
  • Update JwtBearer, WsFed, and OIDC handlers to use identity model 7 #49541
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Remove array allocation from RouteValueDictionary when < 5 route values #49539
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Use correct case in ILCompiler package name #49555
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Improvements to the interaction between SSR and interactive rendering #49238
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Add support for anti-forgery middleware #49530
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-middleware, 8.0-preview7
  • Add support for anti-forgery middleware #49233
    area-middleware, 8.0-rc1
  • Reduce allocations in AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.Combine #49517
    Perf, area-security, 8.0-rc1
  • Update BuildErrors.md #49527
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Update Wilson7 branch #49524
    area-security
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2225374 #49521
    area-mvc, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Support for determining the render mode dynamically #49477
    area-blazor
  • Redis distributed/output cache: include scenario in connection metadata #49291
    area-runtime, feature-output-caching
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.7.23364.32 #49470
    area-infrastructure
  • Clarify API docs for OnAfterRender #49519
    area-blazor
  • Improve HttpContextAccessor debugging #49430
    area-runtime
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #49080
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun
